title: The 30+ Best Games to Play on a Phone Call, FaceTime, or Over Text

steps.title: Hangman
steps.content: Hangman All you need to play Hangman is 2 or more people and a whiteboard (or any writing surface). It might help to write all the letters on the board and cross out which ones that people guess to keep track of which ones are available.
